definitions.body: in J only [[אֵלֽנֵי מַמְרֵא]] terebinths of M. (n.pr.m.?), Ge 13:18 (defined by [[אֲשֶׁר בְּחֶבְרוֹן]]), Ge 18:1 (in both the dwelling-place of Abraham).

definitions.title: 2. n.pr.m.
definitions.body: in Ge 14:13 ([[הָאֱמׂרִי]] ´[[אֵלֽנֵי מ]]), cf. v:Ge 14:24 (where ally of Abr.)

definitions.title: 3. n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in P: near Abr.'s place of burial Ge 23:17, Ge 25:9, Ge 49:30, Ge 50:3; appar. identified with Hebron Ge 23:19 Ge 35:27, cf. Di.—LXX Mambrh.
